nodes.diffHunk: @@ -548,6 +548,10 @@ public void subscribeToDeviceMethod(DeviceMethodCallback deviceMethodCallback, O * the service checking for availability of new messages. The value * is expected to be of type {@code long}. * + * - SetSendInterval - this option is applicable to all protocols. + * This value sets the period (in milliseconds) that this SDK spawns a thread to send a queued message.

nodes.bodyText: Period implies that it spawns periodically, so I like it here
